mapper.select: select count(total_name) from shopping_cart where total_name = #{totalName} and username = #{username}
mapper.update: update shopping_cart set num = num + 1 where total_name = #{totalName}
update shopping_cart set num = #{num} where total_name = #{totalName} and username = #{username}
mapper.delete: delete from shopping_cart where username = #{username} and total_name = #{totalName}
